about_the_game:
Enter a world of darkness and chaos where the fate of humanity rests on the shoulders of a mysterious nun. As the demonic hordes grow stronger with each passing moment, the celestial forces dwindle in numbers. But hope is not lost yet. With your help, the nun can turn the tide of this infernal conflict and save humanity from eternal damnation.

Inspired by legendary nineties fast arcades and old school console clasic games, Nun&Gun is a 2.5D run-and-gun shooter that will take you on a thrilling journey through a world of horror and despair. With fast-paced action, challenging gameplay, and stunning visuals, our game is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.

So what are you waiting for? Join the fight against the forces of darkness and become a hero in this epic battle for humanity’s survival!
